about_the_game:
See the World Differently.


In Possessions, perspective changes everything. Solve mesmerizing puzzles by shifting your view and bending reality to your will. Explore a minimalist 3D world filled with illusionary surprises, and uncover a quiet story of connection and family as you progress.

A Beautiful, Calming Escape.

  • Mind-Bending Puzzles: Use perspective to align objects and solve intricate challenges that test your creativity and spatial thinking.

  • A Story Without Words: Discover a subtle, emotional narrative through visual storytelling—no dialogue, just meaning.

  • Immersive Worlds: Explore vibrant, minimalist 3D environments that twist and transform based on how you view them.

  • Relax and Reflect: A calming soundtrack complements the meditative gameplay, offering a serene escape from the everyday.

Possessions invite you to slow down, reflect, and see the extraordinary in the everyday.
